changelog: - Complete rewrite of the BIOS tweak engine with intelligent value matching
- Dynamic BIOS option detection - automatically finds correct values regardless of motherboard vendor
- Real-time verification: tweaks are now verified after application to confirm success
- Detailed success/failure reporting with specific error messages
- Cross-motherboard compatibility: works correctly on Intel & AMD with different option codes
- Fixed: Tweaks showing as "applied" but not actually written to NVRAM
- Fixed: Deadlock potential when reading SCEWIN output
- Fixed: Incorrect tweak verification on systems with non-standard BIOS codes
- ULTRA-TECH visual design across all sections
- Improved loading states with detailed progress messages
